name: politico
description: POLITICO is a fullstack Javascript application that enables citizens to give their mandate to politicians running for different government offices while building trust in the process through transparency.

scripts.start: npm run drop && npm run tables && node --require @babel/register ./server/server.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing npm run drop && npm run tables &&  nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --timeout 5000 --require @babel/polyfill --require @babel/register Server/tests/* --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Delice Lydia
